nodes.name: subtask_01_Place_the_CoffeeMachine_back_on_the_CounterTop
preconds: Robot is not holding the CoffeeMachine
effects: Robot is not holding the CoffeeMachine

nodes.name: subtask_02_Place_the_Mug_back_on_the_CoffeeMachine
preconds: Mug is on the dining table
CoffeeMachine is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the mug
effects: Mug is placed on the CoffeeMachine
Robot is not holding the mug

nodes.name: subtask_03_Place_the_Fork_back_in_the_Drawer
preconds: Fork is on the dining table.
Robot is close to the drawer.
Robot is not holding the fork.
effects: Fork is placed in the drawer.
Robot is close to the drawer.

nodes.name: subtask_04_Place_the_Spoon_back_in_the_Drawer
preconds: Spoon is on the dining table
Robot is close to the drawer
Robot is not holding the spoon
effects: Spoon is placed in the drawer
Robot is close to the drawer

nodes.name: subtask_05_Place_the_Lettuce_back_in_the_Fridge
preconds: Lettuce is on the dining table.
effects: Lettuce is placed in the fridge.
Robot is not holding the lettuce.

nodes.name: subtask_06_Place_the_Tomato_back_in_the_Fridge
preconds: Tomato is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the tomato
effects: Tomato is placed in the fridge
Robot is not holding the tomato

nodes.name: subtask_07_Place_the_Toaster_back_on_the_CounterTop
preconds: Toaster is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the toaster
effects: Robot is not holding the toaster
